EmailTemplate.name: SR1712020195EN IBM Holiday Email.IBM Holiday Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Season's Greetings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Season's Greetings Members of the IBM-Nokia Community.
We would like to wish you a Happy Holidays and the very best for the New Year
We look forward to continuing our successful collaboration with you in 2018.
Your Nokia Alliance team: Corporate Alliance VP: Desiree Castillejos <[[mailto:desiree.castillejos@nokia.com]]> Sports & Entertainment, Cloud & Data Center Solutions: Timothy Sullivan <[[mailto:Timothy.Sullivan@nokia.com]]> IoT & Americas: Joe Hammer <[[mailto:joe.hammer@nokia.com]]> Europe, Middle East & Africa: Christophe Larcher <[[mailto:christophe.larcher@nokia.com]]> Asia Pacific, Greater China & Japan: Jerome Ah-Soon <[[mailto:jerome.ah-soon@nokia.com]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
